comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: This was taken just a few years before Anthony's passing; several of these suffrage leaders didn't live to see women get the vote in 1920. Dr. Anna Howard Shaw (1847-1919), elsewhere in the Commons: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2595542338/] Harriet Taylor Upton (1853-1945): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harriet_Taylor_Upton Carrie Chapman Catt (1859-1947): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carrie_Chapman_Catt Susan B. Anthony (1820-1906): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Susan_B._Anthony Wonder who the other women were!
